question: Which organization oversees the application of IFRS standards in Saudi Arabia?

options.op1: Ministry of Finance
options.op3: Saudi Organization for Chartered and Professional Accountants

question: Which method is applied under IAS 28 for accounting investments in associates?

options.op1: Cash flow method
options.op3: Fair value method

question: What condition determines significant influence in an investee under IAS 28?

options.op1: Ownership of at least 50% of shares
options.op3: Representation on the Board of Directors

question: What is the main purpose of IAS 28?

options.op1: To guide the handling of employee benefits
options.op2: To specify the accounting for investments in associates and joint ventures
options.op3: To establish principles for consolidation of financial statements
